answers.answer: You have gestational diabetes it will go away after the baby is born. You just need to eat right. Dont stress. I am 25 weeks and had it since 13 wks I take insulin to keep it under control. I don't diet I just be mindful of what I eat

question: Hi guys went to do a check up every thing is ok with the baby but I hav pcos and i develop diabetes never had it before. Has tat happen to anyone and when the baby comes will it go away. Feelin to cry my eyes out
title: sad
